REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2404 reute b f BC-JEFFERIES-MAKES-MARKE 03-20 0049

TEXT.TITLE: JEFFERIES MAKES MARKET IN CYCLOPS <CYL>
TEXT.BODY:
Jefferies and Co said it is making a market in the stock of Cyclops Corp at 92-1/2 to 95. Cyclops received a sweetened offer of 92.50 dlrs per share from Cyacq Acquisition Corp, led by Audio/Video Affiliates Inc <AVA>.
Reuter
